title: I CAN'T GAIN ANY BLUE ESSENCE!!
body: I completed all my missions and collected all the Blue essence orbs but i spent it all. After that i played 1 game and notice my BE did not go up so i thought it was a bug then i restarted the client but it did not change so i played 4 more games and still no changes so I restarted my PC but... still.. no changes. Any help guys?

replies.body:
You get exp from games now. Once you level up (your account) you will receive a champ capsule with each lvl up, containing champ shards which you can turn into essence if you like. You can also receive multiple champ shards in your capsule if you are lucky.

**edit: clarification**

Quick question tho, what am i supposed to do if i didn't even receive a mission which gives me the BE ORB, all my friends got it and they said they got like 15-20k out of it and didn't even get the mission?!?!?!? is riot still working on that or i just don't get one :/

When did you buy your runes for the old system? That mission was for the rune refund, basically you got a percentage of IP (now BE) that you spent on runes and pages back, HOWEVER, if you bought the runes this year (after they went on discount) they did not count for that refund.
Did you spend RP or IP on buying Rune pages? because that was the needed trigger for the events

Yea, the new system gives exp after each match and when u level up u get a capsule with a champ shard and only by disenchanting that do u get BE. More info: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/KsZvsY4T-revert-be-to-ip
